page.title: 10Weekend At Home In Wendover
page.content: My weekend starts on Friday night after homework, when I can sit and watch T.V until bedtime at 9.30pm. There's a mad rush on Saturday morning to have breakfast, get my football kit organised and be at football training on time - for 10am - which isn't very often. We usually practise skills and have a quick game. After lunch I play with friends in the park, ride my bike, or go swimming in Aylesbury. Sometimes I read or watch T.V. Sundays are busy because I am a keen runner and we attend track meetings throughout England. I often win, but not always. When we arrive home it's a long, hot bath for me - then dinner. We always have Sunday roast - lovely! Afterwards I check my homework until lights out at 9.00pm.
